exercises.title: normal press
exercises.info: push the bar with the wight indicated,if is necessary let know someone to assist you

exercises.title: push up
exercises.info: push your body over a flat surface

exercises.title: Incline push up
exercises.info: just like push up, push you body over but over a high surface

exercises.title: Cable crossover
exercises.info: standing away from a set of high pulley cable machine or a resistance band

exercises.title: Chest dip
exercises.info: Straighten your elbows and press into your hands, lifting your body up so that it is in line with your hands

exercises.title: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.info: Place a kettlebell a couple of feet in front of you

exercises.title: Barbell Deadlift
exercises.info: Squat down and grasp a barbell with your hands roughly shoulder-width apart. Keep your chest up

exercises.title: Pull-Up
exercises.info: Grab the handles of the pull-up station with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended

exercises.title: Dumbbell Single-arm Row
exercises.info: Head to a flat bench and place your right hand against it under your shoulder, keeping your arm straight

exercises.title: Renegade Row
exercises.info: Get into a press-up position with your hands on the handles of two dumbbells

exercises.title: Front squat
exercises.info: Load a barbell onto the front of your shoulders, hooking your fingers in an underhand grip on either side of your shoulders to support it

exercises.title: Romanian deadlift
exercises.info: Hold a barbell or one dumbbell in each hand. Keep your back straight and your gaze straight

exercises.title: Walking lunges
exercises.info: Start with your feet together. Hold a dumbbell in each hand if you want to perform a weighted

exercises.title: Single-leg deadlift
exercises.info: Hold a pair of dumbbells. Keep your back straight and your gaze straight throughout the movement.

exercises.title: Lateral lunge
exercises.info: Bend your left knee, sitting back into your left hip and keeping your torso upright. Keep your right leg as straight as possible

exercises.title: Bicep Curl
exercises.info: Holding your palms forwards, bend your elbows and raise the dumbbell up towards your shoulder

exercises.title: Plank To Push-Up
exercises.info: Beginning in a high planking position (i.e. on your hands instead of your elbows), keep your arms directly beneath your shoulders and maintain core engagement.

exercises.title: Overhead Extension
exercises.info: each your hands up, over, and behind your head, holding the dumbbell in a vertical position, keeping your wrists straight

exercises.title: Dumbbell Punch
exercises.info: ift your arms and punch them straight out in front of you, alternating each and keeping the dumbbells at shoulder level as you do

exercises.title: Arnold Press
exercises.info: In a seated position, kick dumbbells up to a traditional starting position and rotate your hands until your palms are facing towards you

exercises.title: Push Press
exercises.info: Set up the same as you would for the barbell overhead press. Assume an upright torso and dip downward four to six inches, knees over toes

exercises.title: Wide-Grip Seated Row
exercises.info: Set up like you would for your regular seated row but use a straight bar attachment. Take an overhand wide grip until your upper arms are about 45 degrees

exercises.title: Incline Y Raise
exercises.info: The incline Y raise can help promote shoulder health, especially for athletes who do a lot of overhead work
